mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS recommendId, c.id, c.`name`, c.tech_domain AS techKeys, c.unit_name AS unitName, c.maturity_level AS maturityLevel, a.s_star AS star, a.h_start AS hstar, a.user_name AS userName, a.recommend_at AS recommendAt, a.status, a.remark FROM t_billboard_harvest_related AS a LEFT JOIN t_billboard AS b ON a.billboard_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_harvest AS c ON a.harvest_id = c.id WHERE b.audit_status = 1 AND b.`status` = 0 AND a.s_star > 0 AND a.billboard_id = #{billboardId} ORDER BY a.create_at DESC

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.unit_name AS nitName , b.start_at AS startAt, b.end_at AS endAt, b.categories, b.tech_keys techKeys, a.s_star AS star, b.content FROM t_billboard_harvest_related AS a LEFT JOIN t_billboard AS b ON a.billboard_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_harvest AS c ON a.harvest_id = c.id WHERE a.harvest_id = #{harvestId} and b.id is not null
ORDER BY a.create_at DESC

SELECT b.title, b.content, b.unit_name AS unitName, b.start_at AS startAt, b.end_at AS endAt, a.s_star AS star, b.categories, b.tech_keys AS techKeys, b.id, b.amount FROM t_billboard_harvest_related a LEFT JOIN t_billboard b ON a.billboard_id = b.id where a.harvest_id = #{harvestId} ORDER BY a.create_at DESC

SELECT b.title AS name, b.content, b.unit_name AS unitName, b.start_at AS startAt, b.end_at AS endAt, a.s_star AS star, b.categories, b.tech_keys AS techKeys, b.id, b.type, b.amount FROM t_billboard_harvest_related a LEFT JOIN t_billboard b ON a.billboard_id = b.id where a.harvest_id = #{harvestId} ORDER BY a.create_at DESC

SELECT b.id, b.`name`, b.guide_picture AS guidePicture, b.appy_domain AS techDomain FROM t_billboard_harvest_related AS a LEFT JOIN t_harvest AS b ON a.harvest_id = b.id WHERE a.billboard_id = #{billboardId} ORDER BY a.s_star DESC LIMIT 3
